queries.query:
from(bucket: "bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pzem004t")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SSID"] == "MeRrai")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "ESP8266")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pzem004t")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SSID"] == "MeRrai")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "ESP8266")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SSID"] == "MeRrai")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "ESP8266")

  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pzem004t")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SSID"] == "MeRrai")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "frequency")

  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pzem004t")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SSID"] == "MeRrai")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "voltage" or r["_field"] == "power" or r["_field"] == "pf" or r["_field"] == "frequency" or r["_field"] == "energy" or r["_field"] == "current")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "ESP8266")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
